name: Combat Heli
description:
Control a combat helicopter in this little free game.
You can start, fly or land safely. Sounds easy?
Just try it! It's free.

!!! This is just a small free flight game, not simulator !!!

★★★ check "Apache 3D Sim" & "Black Shark HD" combat flight simulators for a full combat chopper experience ★★★

Requirements: iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4,4s,5, iPad,iPad2,iPad (3th & 4th Gen), iPad Mini
